headline: How Workiva’s New AI Product Chief and Activist Pressure Could Impact Workiva (WK) Investors
summary: Workiva recently appointed Deepak Bharadwaj as EVP & Chief Product Officer, tasking him with leading product and UX strategy for its AI-powered reporting platform. His background launching AI-driven document tools at Adobe and scaling employee experience products at ServiceNow may influence how Workiva evolves its platform and responds to activist investor pressure for change. We’ll now examine how Bharadwaj’s AI product leadership and rising activist investor interest could reshape...
